oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Doris Freeman with children on Cousin Tuney's Show
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Photograph of Doris Freeman and a group of unidentified children in the studio during a broadcast of Cousin Tuney's Show on WDXI-TV. Behind them is a painted backdrop featuring a sign that reads "Cousin Tuney's." Freeman hosted her own children's show on local radio and television stations in Jackson, Tennessee. She was one of the first women inducted into the Tennessee Radio Hall of Fame.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:source: Looking Back at Tennessee Photograph Collection, 1890-1981
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Talk shows; Children; Women; Communication facilities
